00060 template<typename T>
00061 static inline void hdf5_error(T status)
00062 {
00063   if (status <0)
00064     {
00065       Cerr << "HDF5 error occured - exiting" << finl;
00066       Process::exit();
00067     }
00068 }

00070 FichierHDF::FichierHDF():  file_id_(0), file_access_plst_(0),
00071   dataset_transfer_plst_(0) {}

00073 FichierHDF::~FichierHDF()
00074 {
00075 // close();

00078 void FichierHDF::create(Nom filename)
00079 {
00080   prepare_file_props();
00081   file_id_ = H5Fcreate(filename, H5F_ACC_TRUNC /*H5F_ACC_EXCL*/, H5P_DEFAULT, file_access_plst_);
00082   hdf5_error<hid_t>(file_id_);
00083   Cerr << "HDF5 " << filename << " file created !" << finl;
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 void FichierHDF::open(Nom filename, bool readOnly)
00088 {
00089   prepare_file_props();
00090   hid_t st = readOnly ? H5F_ACC_RDONLY : H5F_ACC_RDWR;
00091   file_id_ = H5Fopen(filename, st, file_access_plst_);
00092   hdf5_error<hid_t>(file_id_);
00093   Cerr << "HDF5 " << filename << " file opened !" << finl;
00094 
00095 }
00096 
00097 void FichierHDF::prepare_file_props()
00098 {
00099   file_access_plst_ = H5Pcreate(H5P_FILE_ACCESS);
00100 
00101 // increasing size of the B-tree containing metadata info (to approximately match the size striping)
00102 // useful when we are writing a lot of chunks
00103 // see https://www.nersc.gov/users/training/online-tutorials/introduction-to-scientific-i-o/?show_all=1
00104 // file_creation_plst_ = H5Pcreate(H5P_FILE_CREATE);
00105 // hsize_t btree_ik = (stripe_size - 4096) / 96;
00106 // H5Pset_istore_k(file_creation_plst_, btree_ik);
00107 }
00108 
00109 void FichierHDF::prepare_dataset_props()
00110 {
00111   dataset_transfer_plst_ = H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_XFER);
00112 }

00114 
00115 void FichierHDF::close()
00116 {
00117   Cerr << "[HDF5] closing file..." << finl;
00118 
00119 // getting file name
00120   char filename[100];
00121   H5Fget_name(file_id_, filename, 100);
00122 
00123   H5Fclose(file_id_);
00124 
00125   if(file_access_plst_)    H5Pclose(file_access_plst_);
00126   if(dataset_transfer_plst_) H5Pclose(dataset_transfer_plst_);
00127   Cerr << "HDF5 " << filename << " file closed !" << finl;
00128 
00129 }
00130 
00131 void FichierHDF::read_dataset(Nom dataset_basename, int proc_rank, Entree_Brute& entree)
00132 {
00133   prepare_dataset_props();
00134 
00135   Nom dataset_name = dataset_basename;
00136   dataset_name = dataset_name.nom_me(proc_rank, 0, 1 /*without_padding*/);
00137 
00138   hid_t dataset_id = H5Dopen2(file_id_, dataset_name, H5P_DEFAULT);
00139   hid_t dataspace_id =  H5Dget_space(dataset_id);
00140   hssize_t sz = H5Sget_simple_extent_npoints(dataspace_id);
00141   char * dset_data = new char[sz];
00142   Cerr << "[HDF5] Reading into HDF dataset " << dataset_name << "...";
00143   H5Dread(dataset_id, H5T_NATIVE_OPAQUE, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, dataset_transfer_plst_, dset_data);
00144   Cerr << " Done !" << finl;
00145 
00146 // Put extracted data in a standard Entree_Brute from TRUST, that we then use to feed TRUST objects
00147   entree.set_data(dset_data, sz);  //!< data are copied into the Entree
00148 
00149   delete[] dset_data;
00150   H5Dclose(dataset_id);
00151   H5Sclose(dataspace_id);
00152 
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 void FichierHDF::create_datasets(Noms dataset_names, hsize_t length)
00157 {
00158   hid_t dataspace_id = H5Screate_simple(1, &length, NULL);
00159 
00160 // Create the dataset
00161   for(int i=0; i<dataset_names.size(); i++)
00162     {
00163       Nom dataset_name = dataset_names[i];
00164       hid_t dataset_id = H5Dcreate2(file_id_, dataset_name, H5T_NATIVE_OPAQUE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT);
00165       hdf5_error<herr_t>(H5Dclose(dataset_id));
00166     }
00167 // Close dataset and dataspace
00168   hdf5_error<herr_t>(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
00169 
00170   Cerr << "[HDF5] All datasets created !" << finl;
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void FichierHDF::fill_dataset(Nom dataset_name, Sortie_Brute& sortie)
00175 {
00176   prepare_dataset_props();
00177 
00178   hsize_t lenData = sortie.get_size();
00179   const char * data = sortie.get_data();
00180 
00181   hsize_t dims[1] = {lenData};
00182   hid_t dataspace_id = H5Screate_simple(1, dims, NULL);
00183 
00184 // Open the dataset
00185   hid_t dataset_id = H5Dopen2(file_id_, dataset_name, H5P_DEFAULT);
00186   hdf5_error<hid_t>(dataset_id );
00187 
00188 // Writing into it:
00189   Cerr << "[HDF5] Writing into HDF dataset " << dataset_name << "...";
00190   hdf5_error<herr_t>(H5Dwrite(dataset_id, H5T_NATIVE_OPAQUE, H5S_ALL, dataspace_id, dataset_transfer_plst_, data));
00191   Cerr << " Done !" << finl;
00192 
00193 // Close dataset and dataspace
00194   hdf5_error<herr_t>(H5Dclose(dataset_id));
00195   hdf5_error<herr_t>(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
00196 
00197 }

00210 void FichierHDF::create_and_fill_dataset_MW(Nom dataset_basename, SChaine& sortie)
00211 {
00212   hsize_t lenData = sortie.get_size();
00213   const char * data = sortie.get_str();
00214 
00215   create_and_fill_dataset_MW(dataset_basename, data, lenData, H5T_C_S1);
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 void FichierHDF::create_and_fill_dataset_MW(Nom dataset_basename, const char* data, hsize_t lenData, hid_t datatype)
00220 {
00221 // collecting the lengths of the datasets from every other processors
00222   long long init_value = lenData;
00223   std::vector<long long> datasets_len(Process::nproc(), init_value);
00224   envoyer_all_to_all(datasets_len, datasets_len);
00225 
00226 // Creating the datasets from every processor
00227 // (metadata have to be written collectively)
00228   std::vector<hid_t> datasets_id(Process::nproc());
00229   Nom my_dataset_name;
00230 
00231   for(int p = 0; p < Process::nproc(); p++)
00232     {
00233       Nom dname = dataset_basename;
00234       dname = dname.nom_me(p, 0, 1 /*without_padding*/);
00235       if(p == Process::me()) my_dataset_name = dname;
00236       hsize_t dlen= datasets_len[p];
00237       hid_t dspace = H5Screate_simple(1, &dlen, NULL);
00238 
00239       datasets_id[p] = H5Dcreate2(file_id_, dname, datatype, dspace,
00240                                   H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT );
00241       H5Sclose(dspace);
00242     }
00243 
00244   Cerr << "[HDF5] All datasets created !" << finl;
00245 
00246   hid_t dataspace_id = H5Screate_simple(1, &lenData, NULL);
00247 
00248   Cerr << "[HDF5] Writing into HDF dataset " << my_dataset_name << "...";
00249 // Writing my own dataset
00250   H5Dwrite(datasets_id[Process::me()], datatype, dataspace_id, H5S_ALL, dataset_transfer_plst_, data);
00251   Cerr << " Dataset written !" << finl;
00252 
00253 // Close dataset and dataspace
00254   for(int p = 0; p < Process::nproc(); p++)
00255     H5Dclose(datasets_id[p]);
00256   Cerr << "[HDF5] All datasets closed !" << finl;
00257 
00258   H5Sclose(dataspace_id);
00259 }
00260 
00261 void FichierHDF::create_and_fill_dataset_SW(Nom dataset_name, Sortie_Brute& sortie)
00262 {
00263   prepare_dataset_props();
00264 
00265   hsize_t lenData = sortie.get_size();
00266   const char * data = sortie.get_data();
00267 
00268   hsize_t dims[1] = {lenData};
00269   hid_t dataspace_id = H5Screate_simple(1, dims, NULL);
00270 
00271 // Create the dataset
00272   hid_t dataset_id = H5Dcreate2(file_id_, dataset_name, H5T_NATIVE_OPAQUE, dataspace_id,
00273                                 H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT);
00274 
00275 // Writing into it:
00276   Cerr << "[HDF5] Writing into HDF dataset " << dataset_name << "...";
00277   H5Dwrite(dataset_id, H5T_NATIVE_OPAQUE, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, dataset_transfer_plst_, data);
00278   Cerr << " Done !" << finl;
00279 
00280 // Close dataset and dataspace
00281   H5Dclose(dataset_id);
00282   H5Sclose(dataspace_id);
00283 
00284 }

00288 bool FichierHDF::exists(const char* dataset_name)
00289 {
00290   return H5Lexists( file_id_, dataset_name, H5P_DEFAULT )>0;
00291 }
00292 
00293 bool FichierHDF::is_hdf5(const char * file_name)
00294 {
00295   return H5Fis_hdf5(file_name)>0;
00296 }
